title: Death Planning
description:
Description :
        A world where natural history has disappeared.With only suicides and murders, the gap between the rich and the poor has widened.Among the rich, people die when they want to die, and funerals like honorable and splendid festivals are prevalent. Seeing them like that, Hee-joon, the team leader of a mutual aid company , pretends to be a good person for his own beautiful funeral, manages his personal connections, and earns money like crazy. Then one day, he is commissioned to design a 'quiet but meaningful death' by Ido, who has the same emptiness in the opposite background ... +
